title: Perv Bar
description:
The Pervbar is a good way to hide your tracks. The best feature of the PervBar is just that. You can delete cookies, temp files, history empty recycle bin, and even delete your recent docs. All from this one little IE based toolbar. The toolbar also has customizable buttons (you can only display what you want).

Of course it comes with a search option. The package is discreetly named and logo\&#039;ed so you don\&#039;t get questioned about a toolbar called The Perv Bar. This isn\&#039;t actually a way to access said material, just hide it (or your tracks when buying that special someone a gift). This version is the first release on CNET

This is available onincase you have any doubts as to it\&#039;s safty.  Terms found on pervbar.googlepages.com
